content:
Here are some healthy snack ideas using leftover chicken breasts:

**Chicken Salad Recipes:**

1. **Classic Chicken Salad**: Mix diced chicken with low-fat mayonnaise, chopped celery, and diced apple. Serve on whole-grain bread or crackers.
2. **Greek Chicken Salad**: Combine diced chicken with Greek yogurt, chopped cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of feta cheese. Serve on whole-grain pita or crackers.
3. **Spicy Chicken Salad**: Mix diced chicken with low-fat mayonnaise, diced jalapeño, chopped cilantro, and a squeeze of lime juice. Serve on whole-grain tortilla chips or crackers.

**Chicken Wrap Recipes:**

1. **Chicken Caesar Wrap**: Fill a whole-grain tortilla with diced chicken, romaine lettuce, sliced avocado, and a drizzle of low-fat Caesar dressing.
2. **Chicken Hummus Wrap**: Spread hummus on a whole-grain tortilla, layer with diced chicken, mixed greens, and sliced cucumber.
3. **Chicken and Avocado Wrap**: Fill a whole-grain tortilla with diced chicken, mashed avocado, mixed greens, and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes.

**Other Healthy Snack Ideas:**

1. **Chicken and Veggie Kabobs**: Skewer diced chicken, bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms. Brush with olive oil and grill or bake until cooked through.
2. **Chicken and Quinoa Bites**: Mix cooked quinoa with diced chicken, chopped herbs, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Form into bite-sized balls and refrigerate until firm.
3. **Chicken and Spinach Pinwheels**: Spread cream cheese on a whole-grain tortilla, layer with diced chicken, spinach, and sliced bell peppers. Roll up and slice into pinwheels.
4. **Chicken and Mango Skewers**: Alternate diced chicken and mango chunks on skewers. Brush with olive oil and grill or bake until cooked through.
5. **Chicken and Cucumber Roll-Ups**: Spread cream cheese on a whole-grain tortilla, layer with diced chicken, sliced cucumber, and a sprinkle of dill. Roll up and slice into rounds.

These healthy snack ideas are perfect for using up leftover chicken breasts and can be customized to fit your dietary preferences and ingredient availability. Enjoy!
